item.title: MIUI OS1.0.8.0.UMBMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13 Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Pro Global

Codename: nuwa

Version: OS1.0.8.0.UMBMIXM | 14.0

Size: 7.9 GB

MD5: 202f2518b1b544ab6f662771bffe936e

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Control center]
Fix: Some toggles occasionally failed to work
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons
[Security]
Optimization: Updated optimization score calculation rules to improve accuracy
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Single-line notification icons were not fully displayed
Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed
Fix: The 5G icon in the status bar wasn't fully displayed after switching font size or changing to a third party font

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.11.0.UMBCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Pro China

Codename: nuwa

Version: OS1.0.11.0.UMBCNXM | 14.0

Size: 8.2 GB

MD5: 5a0e0640589753842d43b4755aa4cba6

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: New startup animation strategy makes apps launch faster
Optimization: App launching algorithm speeds up app opening process
Fix: Some games crashed
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Fix: Video apps weren't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation
Fix: The size of pinned floating windows for some games was incorrect
[Home screen]
Optimization: The animation for swiping up in an app to go back to Home screen
Fix: Empty spots appeared in Second space Home screen layout in some cases
[Cross-device intelligent connectivity]
Optimization: Discovering devices in Xiaomi Smart Hub is faster now
[Lock screen]
New: A switch for a feature that allows long pressing Home screen to edit it
[Clock]
Fix: When setting alarm repetition, the checkbox was displayed abnormally when switching to Dark mode
[Calculator]
Fix: Mortgage loan calculator wasn't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation in Split screen
[Screen Time]
Fix: On rare occasions, time stats weren't displayed in Screen time
[Settings]
New: A major update to CarWith's visual experience, with redesigned styles for 6 different horizontal and vertical car system screen sizes. This update includes new cards for maps and music, and Mi AI conversation styles.
New: CarWith now offers enhanced personalization options, including wallpapers, backgrounds, card sorting, widgets, and more
Optimization: Enhanced CarWith navigation experience by supporting fullscreen map navigation and introducing a new floating navigation window
Optimization: CarWith connectivity and overall stability
[Security]
Fix: Disaster warning subscribed locations disappeared in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Text and notifications were displayed incorrectly for some languages under specific conditions

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.11.0.UMBCNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Version: OS1.0.11.0.UMBCNXM | 14.0

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: New startup animation strategy makes apps launch faster
Optimization: App launching algorithm speeds up app opening process
Fix: Some games crashed
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Fix: Video apps weren't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation
Fix: The size of pinned floating windows for some games was incorrect
[Home screen]
Optimization: The animation for swiping up in an app to go back to Home screen
Fix: Empty spots appeared in Second space Home screen layout in some cases
[Cross-device intelligent connectivity]
Optimization: Discovering devices in Xiaomi Smart Hub is faster now
[Lock screen]
New: A switch for a feature that allows long pressing Home screen to edit it
[Clock]
Fix: When setting alarm repetition, the checkbox was displayed abnormally when switching to Dark mode
[Calculator]
Fix: Mortgage loan calculator wasn't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation in Split screen
[Screen Time]
Fix: On rare occasions, time stats weren't displayed in Screen time
[Settings]
New: A major update to CarWith's visual experience, with redesigned styles for 6 different horizontal and vertical car system screen sizes. This update includes new cards for maps and music, and Mi AI conversation styles.
New: CarWith now offers enhanced personalization options, including wallpapers, backgrounds, card sorting, widgets, and more
Optimization: Enhanced CarWith navigation experience by supporting fullscreen map navigation and introducing a new floating navigation window
Optimization: CarWith connectivity and overall stability
[Security]
Fix: Disaster warning subscribed locations disappeared in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Text and notifications were displayed incorrectly for some languages under specific conditions
